text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (Envy Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (max 1)
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 20+ [Charge] Count, Spend 20 [Charge] Count to deal +30% damage

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (Envy Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] Deal +((Envy Reson. - 3) x 5)% damage (max 15%)
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 20+ [Charge] Count, Spend 20 [Charge] Count to deal +35% damage

[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 20+ [Charge] Count, Spend 20 [Charge] Count to deal +40% damage

passiveList.name: Tempestuous Screaming
passiveList.desc: If the target is defeated at this unit's Slash or Envy Affinity Skill End, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain (Envy Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (max 1)
[BeforeAttack] Deal +((Envy Reson. - 3) x 5)% damage (max 15%)
[BeforeAttack] At less than 20 [Charge] Count, spend 1.5% of this unit's max HP per missing [Charge] Count to raise [Charge] Count to 20
[BeforeAttack] Spend up to 20 [Charge] Count to deal +2.5% damage for every spent [Charge] Count (max 50%)

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain (Envy Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (max 2)

[BeforeAttack] At less than 20 [Charge] Count, spend 1.5% of this unit's max HP per missing [Charge] Count to raise [Charge] Count to 20
[BeforeAttack] Spend up to 20 [Charge] Count to deal +3.5% damage for every spent [Charge] Count (max 70%)

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly

[BeforeAttack] Spend up to 20 [Charge] Count to deal +5% damage for every spent [Charge] Count (max 100%)
